title: Military Thriller 'Valiant One' Trailer with Chase Stokes & Lana Condor
description: "No matter how hard it gets, you stick your chest out." Briarcliff Ent. has revealed an official trailer for a military thriller called Valiant One, marking the feature directorial debut of producer Steve Barnett. This is ready for release early next year in theaters starting at the end of January 2025. In the heart-pounding military thriller Valiant One, a routine mission spirals into a fight for survival when a US Army helicopter crashes deep within North Korean territory. With strained tensions between North & South Korea, the team of survivors must work together to protect one more civilian and find their way out without the help of US military support. They desperately race across the treacherous Demilitarized Zone. Valiant One stars Chase Stokes, Lana Condor, Desmin Borges, and Callan Mulvey. Another upcoming jingoistic war movie to watch if you need an adrenaline rush in the cinema next year. This has a mix of action thriller footage along with an intense survival story - that's more about them figuring how to stick together and make it out safely. text: TRAILERS by November 21, 2024Source: YouTube "No matter how hard it gets, you stick your chest out." Briarcliff Ent. has revealed an official trailer for a military thriller called Valiant One, marking the feature directorial debut of producer Steve Barnett. This is ready for release early next year in theaters starting at the end of January 2025. In the heart-pounding military thriller Valiant One, a routine mission spirals into a fight for survival when a US Army helicopter crashes deep within North Korean territory. With strained tensions between North & South Korea, the team of survivors must work together to protect one more civilian and find their way out without the help of US military support. They desperately race across the treacherous Demilitarized Zone. Valiant One stars Chase Stokes, Lana Condor, Desmin Borges, and Callan Mulvey. Another upcoming jingoistic war movie to watch if you need an adrenaline rush in the cinema next year. This has a mix of action thriller footage along with an intense survival story - that's more about them figuring how to stick together and make it out safely. Here's the first official trailer for Steve Barnett's film Valiant One, direct from YouTube: In the heart-pounding military thriller film Valiant One, a routine mission spirals into a fight for survival when a US Army helicopter crashes deep within North Korean territory. With all of their communications equipment destroyed, the remaining survivors including Captain Edward Brockman (Chase Stokes) and Selby (Lana Condor) must lead the team through hostile terrain, cut off from any US military support as they attempt a daring escape across and through the treacherous Demilitarized Zone to South Korea. Valiant One is directed by filmmaker Steve Barnett, making his feature directorial debut after producing many films and working as an executive in the film industry. The screenplay is written by Steve Barnett and Eric Tipton. Produced by Steve Barnett, Bernie Goldmann, and Alan Powell. Briarcliff Entertainment will debut Barnett's Valiant One in select US theater starting January 31st, 2025 early next year. Look good? Find more posts: To Watch, Trailer prev next
html:
TRAILERS

by
November 21, 2024
Source: YouTube

"No matter how hard it gets, you stick your chest out." Briarcliff Ent. has revealed an official trailer for a military thriller called Valiant One, marking the feature directorial debut of producer Steve Barnett. This is ready for release early next year in theaters starting at the end of January 2025. In the heart-pounding military thriller Valiant One, a routine mission spirals into a fight for survival when a US Army helicopter crashes deep within North Korean territory. With strained tensions between North & South Korea, the team of survivors must work together to protect one more civilian and find their way out without the help of US military support. They desperately race across the treacherous Demilitarized Zone. Valiant One stars Chase Stokes, Lana Condor, Desmin Borges, and Callan Mulvey. Another upcoming jingoistic war movie to watch if you need an adrenaline rush in the cinema next year. This has a mix of action thriller footage along with an intense survival story - that's more about them figuring how to stick together and make it out safely.

Here's the first official trailer for Steve Barnett's film Valiant One, direct from YouTube:

In the heart-pounding military thriller film Valiant One, a routine mission spirals into a fight for survival when a US Army helicopter crashes deep within North Korean territory. With all of their communications equipment destroyed, the remaining survivors including Captain Edward Brockman (Chase Stokes) and Selby (Lana Condor) must lead the team through hostile terrain, cut off from any US military support as they attempt a daring escape across and through the treacherous Demilitarized Zone to South Korea. Valiant One is directed by filmmaker Steve Barnett, making his feature directorial debut after producing many films and working as an executive in the film industry. The screenplay is written by Steve Barnett and Eric Tipton. Produced by Steve Barnett, Bernie Goldmann, and Alan Powell. Briarcliff Entertainment will debut Barnett's Valiant One in select US theater starting January 31st, 2025 early next year. Look good?

Find more posts: To Watch, Trailer
